responses: Create a schedule! Break your tasks into smaller pieces, set deadlines, and prioritize your most important work first.
Use the Pomodoro technique: study for 25 minutes, then take a 5-minute break. This helps with focus and reduces stress.
It’s important to plan your day and stick to a routine. Setting specific study hours and sticking to them can improve your productivity.
Try setting achievable goals and reward yourself when you accomplish them. It keeps you motivated and on track!
